article.ArticleTitle: Tech Giant Invests Huge Money to Build a Computer Out of Science Fiction
article.ArticleText: The tech giant says it is ready to begin planning a quantum computer, a powerful cpu machine that relies on subatomic pArticleicles instead of transistors.
